price: So enter the gates of Hell, abiding therein forever. What a terrible abode for those who were arrogant!”
arabic: فَٱدۡخُلُوٓاْ أَبۡوَٰبَ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۖ فَلَبِئۡسَ مَثۡوَى ٱلۡمُتَكَبِّرِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fa-ud'khulū abwāba jahannama khālidīna fīhā falabi'sa mathwā al-mutakabirīna
